description.brazilian: Acorde todos os heróis
description.english: Wake up every hero
description.french: Réveiller tous les héros.
description.japanese: すべてのヒーローを目覚めさせる
description.schinese: 唤醒每个英雄

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os heróis
description.english: Unlock all heroes
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les héros.
description.japanese: すべてのヒーローをアンロックする
description.schinese: 解锁所有英雄

description.brazilian: Salve a Magolândia
description.english: Save Magetown
description.french: Sauver Mageville.
description.japanese: メイジタウンを救う
description.schinese: 拯救法师镇

description.brazilian: Salve a Nevópolis
description.english: Save Snowtown
description.french: Sauver Neigeville.
description.japanese: スノータウンを救う
description.schinese: 拯救白雪镇

description.brazilian: Salve a Escavalonge
description.english: Save Digtown
description.french: Sauver Creuseville.
description.japanese: ディグタウンを救う
description.schinese: 拯救挖掘镇

description.brazilian: Salve a Batalhita.
description.english: Save Battletown
description.french: Sauver Jouteville.
description.japanese: バトルタウンを救う
description.schinese: 拯救战斗镇

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de queimadura a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of burn to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de brûlure sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Verbrennung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に炎上を100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层燃烧效果。

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de choque a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of shock to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls d’électrocution sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Schock.
description.japanese: 敵1体にショックを100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层电击效果。

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de veneno a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of poison to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de poison sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Vergiftung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に毒を100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层中毒效果。

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de congelamento a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of freeze to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de gel sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Erfrierung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に凍結を100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层冰冻效果。

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de sangramento a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of bleed to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de saignement sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Blutung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に出血を100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层流血效果。

displayName.english: Is There a Window Open? I Feel a Draft
displayName.german: Ist ein Fenster offen? Es zieht
displayName.japanese: 窓開いてる？そよ風が吹いてる

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de desvantagem de ataque a um inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of attack debuff to an enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de malus d’attaque sur un ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Angriffsschwächung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に攻撃力デバフを100スタック付与する
description.schinese: 对一个敌人施加 100 层攻击减益效果。

displayName.german: Den konnte ich eh nicht leiden

description.brazilian: Aplique 100 acúmulos de queimadura, choque, veneno, congelamento e sangramento a um único inimigo
description.english: Apply 100 stacks of burn, shock, poison, freeze, and bleed to a single enemy
description.french: Appliquer 100 cumuls de brûlure, d’électrocution, de poison, de gel et de saignement sur un même ennemi.
description.german: Belege einen einzelnen Gegner mit 100 Stapeln Verbrennung, Schock, Vergiftung, Erfrierung & Blutung.
description.japanese: 敵1体に炎上、ショック、毒、凍結、出血を100スタック付与する。
description.schinese: 对单个敌人施加 100 层燃烧、电击、中毒、冰冻和流血效果。

displayName.japanese: なんで自分を殴ってるの！？

description.brazilian: Devolva 100 de dano a um inimigo
description.english: Return 100 damage to an enemy
description.french: Renvoyer 100 points de dégâts sur un ennemi.
description.german: Gib 100 Schaden an einen Gegner zurück.
description.japanese: 敵1体に100ダメージ反射する
description.schinese: 将 100 点伤害返还给一个敌人

description.brazilian: Vença todas as batalhas nas arenas de luta
description.english: Win every battle in the Fighting Pits
description.french: Gagner chaque combat dans l’arène.
description.german: Gewinne jeden Kampf in den Kampfarenen.
description.japanese: 戦いの穴ですべての戦いに勝利する
description.schinese: 赢得格斗坑中的每一场战斗

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os itens
description.english: Unlock all items
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les objets.
description.japanese: すべてのアイテムをアンロックする
description.schinese: 解锁所有物品

description.brazilian: Melhore todos os itens até o nível 5
description.english: Upgrade all items to level 5
description.french: Améliorer tous les objets au niveau 5.
description.german: Werte alle Gegenstände auf Stufe 5 auf.
description.japanese: すべてのアイテムをレベル5までアップグレードする
description.schinese: 将所有物品升级到 5 级

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas
description.english: Unlock all skits
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les interactions.
description.japanese: すべてのスキットをアンロックする
description.schinese: 解锁所有小剧场

displayName.brazilian: Trabalhando Duro ou Duro de Trabalhar

description.brazilian: Obtenha x100 de multiplicador no quadro de avisos
description.english: Get a x100 multiplier on the bulletin board
description.french: Obtenir un multiplicateur de x100 sur le panneau d’affichage.
description.german: Erhalte einen Multiplikator von 100 auf dem Schwarzen Brett.
description.japanese: 掲示板の倍率を100倍にする
description.schinese: 在公告板上获得 x100 倍数

description.brazilian: Derrote ou suborne Mortimer
description.english: Defeat or bribe Mortimer
description.french: Vaincre ou soudoyer Mortimer.
description.japanese: モーティマーを倒すか賄賂を渡す
description.schinese: 击败或贿赂莫蒂默

description.brazilian: Derrote ou suborne as gêmeas
description.english: Defeat or bribe the Twins
description.french: Vaincre ou soudoyer les jumelles.
description.japanese: 双子を倒すか賄賂を渡す
description.schinese: 击败或贿赂双胞胎

description.brazilian: Derrote ou suborne os quatro dragões
description.english: Defeat or bribe the four dragons
description.french: Vaincre ou soudoyer les quatre dragons.
description.german: Besiege oder bestich die vier Drachen.
description.japanese: 四龍を倒すか賄賂を渡す
description.schinese: 击败或贿赂四条龙

displayName.french: Grand-mère, que tu as de grands yeux !
displayName.german: Warum hast du so eine große Brille?

description.brazilian: Encontre a vovó
description.english: Find Grandma
description.french: Trouver Grand-mère.
description.japanese: おばあちゃんを見つける
description.schinese: 找到奶奶

description.brazilian: Derrote o Jake
description.english: Defeat Jake
description.french: Vaincre Jake.
description.japanese: ジェイクを倒す
description.schinese: 击败杰克

description.brazilian: Suborne o Jake
description.english: Bribe Jake
description.french: Soudoyer Jake.
description.japanese: ジェイクに賄賂を渡す
description.schinese: 贿赂杰克

description.brazilian: Conclua o final verdadeiro
description.english: Complete the true ending
description.french: Découvrir la vraie fin du jeu.
description.japanese: トゥルーエンドをクリアする
description.schinese: 完成真正的大结局

displayName.brazilian: Tudo Fica Bem Se Acaba Bem...?
displayName.french: Tout est bien qui finit bien... ?
displayName.japanese: 終わり良ければすべて良し…？

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo Padrão
description.english: Complete Standard game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode standard.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「標準」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成标准游戏模式

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo Inimigos Fortões
description.english: Complete Tougher Enemies game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Ennemis coriaces.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「強敵」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成强敌游戏模式

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo Pacifista
description.english: Complete Pacifist game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Pacifiste.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「平和主義者」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成和平主义者游戏模式

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo Ocioso
description.english: Complete Idle game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Auto.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「放置」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成放置游戏模式

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo Problema Dobrado
description.english: Complete Double Trouble game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Double peine.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「トラブル倍増」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成双重麻烦游戏模式

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo de jogo MALIGNO
description.english: Complete EVIL game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode FATAL.
description.japanese: ゲームモード「邪悪」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成邪恶游戏模式

description.brazilian: Termine todos os modos de jogo
description.english: Beat every game mode
description.french: Terminer le jeu dans tous les modes.
description.japanese: すべてのゲームモードをクリアする
description.schinese: 通关全部游戏模式

description.brazilian: Pegue todos os tipos de peixe no jogo de pescaria (incluindo os ruins!)
description.english: Catch every type of fish in the fishing game (including the bad ones!)
description.french: Attraper tous les types de poissons dans le mini-jeu Pêche. (Y compris les mauvais !)
description.german: Fange alle Arten von Fischen im Spiel (auch die schlechten).
description.japanese: 釣りゲームで全種類の魚を釣る（悪いものも含む！）
description.schinese: 在钓鱼游戏中捕获每一种鱼（包括坏鱼！）

description.brazilian: Resolva todos os quebra-cabeças de escavação do pântano
description.english: Solve all of the swamp digging puzzles
description.french: Résoudre tous les puzzles de creusage du marais.
description.japanese: 沼堀りパズルをすべて解く
description.schinese: 解决全部沼泽挖掘谜题

description.brazilian: Resolva dos quebra-cabeças de escavação na neve
description.english: Solve all of the snow digging puzzles
description.french: Résoudre tous les puzzles de creusage de neige.
description.japanese: 雪掘りパズルをすべて解く
description.schinese: 解决全部雪地挖掘谜题

description.brazilian: Pegue o Henry!
description.english: Catch Henry!
description.french: Attrapez Henry !
description.japanese: ヘンリーを捕まえる！
description.schinese: 抓住亨利！

description.brazilian: Jogue uma bola bônus no minijogo de mineração.
description.english: Throw a bonus ball in the mining game
description.french: Lancez une balle bonus dans le mini-jeu de la mine.
description.german: Wirf im Minispiel Bergbau einen Bonusball.
description.japanese: 採掘ミニゲームでボーナスボールを投げる。
description.schinese: 在采矿游戏中投掷奖励球
